name: QoS & Traffic Management
description: Sub-sector template for QoS and traffic management patents (CPC H04L47*) including scheduling, shaping, and congestion control.
contextDescription: QoS and traffic management patents cover network resource allocation. Key areas include traffic scheduling (WFQ, priority queuing), traffic shaping, congestion control (ECN, AQM), and bandwidth management. High-value targets include enterprise networks, 5G transport, and cloud providers. Critical for ensuring service quality.
scoringGuidance: Congestion control patents (BBR, CUBIC improvements) improve TCP performance.
Traffic scheduling patents ensure SLA compliance.
ECN/AQM patents improve data center performance.
5G transport QoS patents target mobile backhaul.
Multi-tenant QoS patents target cloud providers.
